pages.disclaimers: PokerChampionships - Disclaimers and Terms of Service PokerChampionships HOME ABOUT US GAMES Contact Disclaimers **General Disclaimer:** The information provided on this website (the "PokerChampionships website") is for informational and entertainment purposes only and should not be construed as professional advice or guidance. pages.games: PokerChampionships - Thrilling Poker Games and Jackpots PokerChampionships HOME ABOUT US GAMES Contact OUR GAMES DIAMOND OPEN POKER Minimum bet $10 / $25 Experience the excitement of Diamond Open Poker exclusively at Royal Casino Batumi, where each player can play poker with FOUR hands OPEN. The minimum dealer’s game is “Ace-King”. Players can buy one (sixth) card or exchange from one to five cards for the cost of an Ante bet. The payouts match standard ones, while “Two Pairs” pay 1:1. Ante is not included in the bet’s payout. Players may receive payouts for two combinations simultaneously. GOLDEN NIU NIU Minimum bet $5 $5 – $9.5 Bet = Jackpot 25% $10 – $24.5 Bet = Jackpot 50% $24 – Higher Bet = Jackpot 100% Only one bonus is awarded at a time. SAPPHIRE STUD POKER Cash games starting from $5/5 Join our Poker Club from 19:00 until the last customer leaves for thrilling Stud Poker cash games. Daily Texas Holdem & Omaha cash games ($5/5, $5/10) attract international players. Our club regularly hosts international cash game festivals. READ MORE LUCKY SLOTS AND E-ROULETTE Minimum bet 0.1 GEL Enjoy a selection of 36 latest EGT slot machines linked to various jackpots, depending on your bet level. Our 10 latest Apex e-roulette terminals feature a minimum bet of 0.1 GEL. The e-roulette offers two automatic wheels and an option to bet on the live roulette table at Royal Batumi casino. The terminals also provide electronic versions of Baccarat (Punto Banco) and Sic Bo. The PokerChampionships website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.privacy-policy: PokerChampionships - Privacy Policy PokerChampionships HOME ABOUT US GAMES Contact Privacy Policy We at PokerChampionships respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. **Information We Collect:** Information you provide voluntarily: This may include your name, email address, and any other information you submit through contact forms, registration for newsletters, or participation in contests. Non-personally identifiable information: We may collect non-personally identifiable information about your use of the website, such as your browsing history, IP address, and device information. This information is collected through cookies and other tracking technologies. **How We Use Your Information:** To provide and improve the website and its services. To send you newsletters or marketing communications (with your consent). To personalize your experience on the website. To analyze website traffic and usage patterns. **Sharing Your Information:** We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except in the following cases: To comply with legal requirements or court orders. To protect our rights and property. To third-party service providers who help us operate the website, such as analytics providers. We may share non-personally identifiable information with third parties for advertising or marketing purposes. **Your Choices:** You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. **Data Security:** We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website can guarantee complete security. **Children's Privacy:** Our website is not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. **Changes to this Privacy Policy:** We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will post any changes on this page. The PokerChampionships website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
